What is known about the new plenipotentiary representative of the President of the Russian Federation in the Ural Federal District Artem Zhoga.‚ñ™Ô∏èBorn on January 18, 1975 in the village of Shirokiy, Susumansky district of the Magadan region. Since the 1990s, he lived in Ukraine in the city of Slavyansk, Donetsk region.‚ñ™Ô∏èIn the 1990s, he was engaged in business.‚ñ™Ô∏èIn 2014, he joined the Donbass people‚Äôs militia. He served in the 'Sparta' battalion, a unit of the DPR people's militia, commanded by Arsen Pavlov (call sign Motorola).‚ñ™Ô∏èIn 2016, the unit was headed by Artem Zhoga's son, Vladimir. Artem Zhoga himself took the position of chief of staff.‚ñ™Ô∏èAfter the death of his son in March 2022, he became commander of the Sparta battalion.‚ñ™Ô∏èOn September 10, 2023, he was elected as a deputy of the republican parliament from the United Russia party. On September 20, 2023, he was elected chairman of the People's Council of the DPR.‚ñ™Ô∏èOn December 8, 2023, at the Golden Star medal ceremony, Zhoga addressed Putin, asking him to take part in the presidential elections in 2024. ‚ñ™Ô∏èAwarded the Order of Courage.
